bwwExcerpt: But all their love and dedication has failed to capture the intrinsic whimsical charm of the film (which made an international star of Audrey Tautou). A little bit of whimsy goes just so far on stage unless it is played full out. The creators haven't committed fully, staying somewhat in a neutral, realistic space that this piece doesn't quite work in.
